full_summary:
===============

### Senior Organizational Design and Classification Consultant

#### Solicitation Number: W8486-239000/A

The Department of National Defence invites proposals from pre-qualified suppliers for a Senior Organizational Design and Classification Consultant under Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) arrangement E60ZT-18TSPS.

#### Key Details

* **Number of Adopted Tender: 1**
* **Classification: Senior Advisor - Human Resources**
* **Place of Work: National Capital Region (NCR), specifically at the Carling Campus (60 Moodie Drive) - Ottawa, Ontario.**
* **Estimated Value (CAD): Less than 2 million dollars**
* **Delivery Date: As soon as possible**
* **Pre-Qualified Suppliers: List of 98 companies provided in Annex A**

#### Description of Requirement

The Department of National Defence requires a Senior Organizational Design and Classification Consultant to provide expert advice on organizational design, classification, and human resources services. The consultant will work under the direction of the Human Resources Services Management Team to provide a range of services, including but not limited to, organizational design, role classification, job description development, and implementation.

#### Selection Criteria

Bidders must demonstrate expertise in the required areas and provide the necessary information as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation. The successful bidder will be selected based on a combination of criteria, including expertise, experience, and past performance.

#### Proposal Requirements

* Bidders must submit their proposals via email directly to the Contracting Authority
* Proposals must include all required information as outlined in the bid solicitation
* Late proposals will be rejected

#### Inquiries and Contact Information

Inquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted to the Contracting Authority, Kelsey Lawrence:
```python
kelsey.lawrence2@forces.gc.ca
```
#### Closing Date

February 22, 2023 at 14:00:00 Eastern Standard Time

#### Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents are available electronically and will be e-mailed directly to pre-qualified suppliers. They can be accessed through the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS) website.

#### Rights Reserved

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Additional Contact

Kelsey Lawrence (Contracting Authority)
kelsey.lawrence2@forces.gc.ca
https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders

Note: You listed 98 pre-qualifeid suppliers, you may prefer
